Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.LobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEventHandler, MainEventHandler, UI
public class LobbyController extends Controller
Allows to show the single lobby, after joining.

    • handleLobbiesEvent

      public void handleLobbiesEvent(List<LobbyInfo> lobbies)
      This method handles the reception of the active lobbies. Updates the player list if it changed, quits the lobby if the user quit or changes to game scene if game started.
      Specified by:
      handleLobbiesEvent in interface MainEventHandler
      Overrides:
      handleLobbiesEvent in class Controller
      Parameters:
      lobbies - list of lobbies

    • handleGameStartedEvent

      Specified by:

      handleGameStartedEvent in class Controller
      Parameters:

    • handleStartGameError

      public void handleStartGameError(String error)
      Description copied from interface: MainEventHandler
      Method called when an error occurred while starting a game. Possible errors are user is not the lobby manager, the lobby doesn't exist or there aren't enough players in the lobby.
      Specified by:
      handleStartGameError in interface MainEventHandler
      Overrides:
      handleStartGameError in class Controller
      Parameters:
      error - the error message
